mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (ID, USER_IDENTIFICATION, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME,USER_MARKETING,USER_ALARM,USER_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL, #{userIdentification}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickname}, #{userNickname},#{userMarketing},#{userAlarm},#{userStatus})
mapper.select:
SELECT USER_IDENTIFICATION,USER_NICKNAME, USER_TISSUE, USER_ROLE,USER_CREATED_DATE FROM ( SELECT USER_IDENTIFICATION,USER_NICKNAME, USER_TISSUE, USER_ROLE,USER_CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_USER ORDER BY ID DESC )
